com.datecs.hub

Interface SlaveConnection


  • public interface SlaveConnection
    Listen for slave connection state changed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onSlaveConnected(int slaveID)
      This method is called when new device is connected.
      void onSlaveDisconnected(int slaveID, boolean overCurrent)
      This method is call when device is disconnected or communication is not possible.

    • Method Detail

      • onSlaveConnected

        void onSlaveConnected(int slaveID)
        This method is called when new device is connected.
        Parameters:
        slaveID - slave identifier.

      • onSlaveDisconnected

        void onSlaveDisconnected(int slaveID,
                       boolean overCurrent)
        This method is call when device is disconnected or communication is not possible.
        Parameters:
        slaveID - slave identifier.
        overCurrent - when overcurrent condition is detected on USB slave and it is temporary disabled.
